trans-unit.source: Represents a composite control that has a primary button that responds to a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Click" /> event and a secondary button that displays a drop-down list of mutually exclusive values.
trans-unit.target: 表示複合控制項，此控制項具有回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Click" />事件的主按鈕和顯示互斥值下拉清單的輔助按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控制項在大型、 中型和小型的變化，以及使用任何映像。
![功能區分割按鈕控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項")
功能區分割按鈕控制項

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations show <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls when the drop-down is opened.
trans-unit.target: 下列圖例顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控制開啟下拉式清單時。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open")
trans-unit.target: ![功能區分割按鈕控制項的拖放-下開啟](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項，開啟下拉式清單")

trans-unit.source: Ribbon split button control with drop-down open
trans-unit.target: 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區分割按鈕控制項

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open")
trans-unit.target: ![功能區分割按鈕控制項的拖放-下開啟](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項，開啟下拉式清單")

trans-unit.source: Ribbon split button control with drop-down open
trans-unit.target: 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區分割按鈕控制項

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup to create a split button with three available items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用三個可用的項目建立的分割按鈕的標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷會在控制項處於選取狀態時用來繪製其背景。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 筆刷，這個筆刷會在控制項處於選取狀態時用來繪製其背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷會在控制項處於選取狀態時用來繪製其外部框線。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 筆刷，這個筆刷會在控制項處於選取狀態時用來繪製其外部框線。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the button is clicked.
Gets or sets the command that is associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此控制項相關聯的指令。

trans-unit.source: The command that is associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與此控制項關聯的指令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a user-defined data value to pass to the command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要傳遞給該指令的使用者定義的資料值。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined data value to pass to the command.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給該命令的使用者定義的資料值。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定引發指定命令的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to invoke the command.
trans-unit.target: 要對其叫用命令的項目。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示中的描述性文字。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中頁尾的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示之頁尾中的描述性文字。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中頁尾的影像。

trans-unit.source: The image to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示之頁尾中的影像。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中頁尾的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The title text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示之頁尾中的標題文字。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中的影像。

trans-unit.source: The image to display in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示中的影像。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示之下拉式區域中的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The title text to display in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在工具提示中的標題文字。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此控制項標題區域的鍵盤快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項標題區域的鍵盤快速鍵。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且必須包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示有時也稱為快速鍵或快速鍵，而且可用以啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>您按下 ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定唯一識別項，這個識別項會將功能區控制項連結至快速存取工具列中的對應控制項。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for a control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 在快速存取工具列中控制項的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a user can check and uncheck the button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以核取和取消核取按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can check and uncheck the button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以核取和取消核取按鈕則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the button behaves as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性是`true`，按鈕的行為如同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否核取按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鈕已核取則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the relative position of the label for this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出此控制項的標籤的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the relative position of the label.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，指出標籤的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的新自動對等物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" /> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 為這個控制項建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在套用新的範本時，建置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序 (例如重建配置傳遞) 呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> 方法時，就會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" /> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 為這個控制項建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的新自動對等物件。
